

    # README generator


    ## Description:
    
    generates a readme from user input
    

    ## Table of Contents 

    * [Installation](#Installation)
    * [Usage](#Usage)
    * [License](#License)
    * [Contribution](#Contribution)

    ## Installation:

    install Node, then use node index.js command

    ## Usage:

    to generate a readme
